name: Crimbo's Adventure
description:
Crimbo's Adventure is a 2D Puzzle Platformer where you take on the role of Crimbo, an animated Candy Cane from the North Pole, on a mission to recover Santa's lost presents before the dawn of Christmas Day. 

You'll have 3 minutes to try and completely save Christmas. Push as many presents as you can into Santa's present bag and get it to the Sleigh to move through 7 levels that will test your logic. There are 4 possible endings depending on how well you do.

Use A / D or  Left / Right to move Crimbo, and Spacebar to jump (the game is also controller compatible if you have one). 

This game was created for the Game Off 2022 Game Jam with our chosen cliche' and theme being "Christmas is coming".

Crimbo's Adventure features original music and sound effects created by the talented Frank Regan. Follow him and find more of his incredible work here:
